mapper.sql: id, hall_id, guild_id, uid, create_time, update_time, is_del, member_type
mapper.select:
select
from guild_hall_member where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_del=false
mapper.insert:
insert into guild_hall_member
id,
hall_id,
guild_id,
uid,
create_time,
update_time,
is_del,
member_type,

mapper.update:
update guild_hall_member
hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
guild_id = #{guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update guild_hall_member set hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, guild_id = #{guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select g.id as guildId, g.guild_no as guildNo, g.name as guildName, g.president_uid as guildPresidentUid, g.logo_url as guildLogoUrl,
m.hall_id as hallId, m.uid, r.uid as hallUid, u.nick, u.erban_no as erbanNo, u.avatar, m.member_type as memberType, m.id as memberId from guild_hall_member m inner join users u on m.uid=u.uid left join guild_hall h on h.id=m.hall_id and h.is_del=false left join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id or g.id=m.guild_id left join room r on r.room_id=h.room_id where m.uid=#{uid} and g.is_del=false and m.is_del=false

select u.uid, u.erban_no as erbanNo, u.nick, u.avatar, m.create_time, m.member_type as type from guild_hall_member m inner join users u on u.uid=m.uid where m.guild_id=#{guildId} and m.is_del=false order by m.create_time desc

select m.uid, u.erban_no as erbanNo, u.nick, u.avatar, m.create_time, m.member_type as type from guild_hall_member m inner join users u on u.uid=m.uid where m.hall_id=#{hallId} and m.is_del=false order by m.create_time desc

select
from guild_hall_member where hall_id = #{hallId} and is_del=false

select
from guild_hall_member where uid=#{uid} and is_del=false
